ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1964
ComicInfo.Summary:
Another pulse-pounding issue of the legendary British weekly comic, including: Judge Dredd: Ghosts by Michael Carroll, Mark Sexton, Len O'Grady, and Annie Parkhouse; Strontium Dog: Repo Men by John Wagner, Carlos Ezquerra, Simon Bowland; The Order: In the Court of the WyrmQueene by Kek-W, John Burns, Ellie De Ville; ABC Warriors: Return to Ro-Busters by Pat Mills, Clint Langley, Annie Parkhouse; and Kingdom: Beast of Eden by Dan Abnett, Richard Elson, Ellie De Ville.
Cover: Ryan Brown
Judge Dredd - Ghosts (Part 2) (Michael Carroll - Mark Sexton)Kingdom - Beast of Eden: Two (Part 4) (Dan Abnett - Richard Elson)The Order - In the Court of the Wyrmqueen (Part 4) (Kek-W - John Burns)The ABC Warriors - Return To Ro-Busters (Part 4) (Pat Mills - Clint Langley)Strontium Dogs - Repo Men (Part 4) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-24 16:17:33. [CVDB511570]
ComicInfo.Writer: Dan Abnett, John Wagner, Kek-W, Michael Carroll, Pat Mills
ComicInfo.Penciller: Carlos Ezquerra, Clint Langley, John Burns, Mark Sexton, Richard Elson, Carlos Ezquerra, Clint Langley, John Burns, Mark Sexton, Richard Elson
ComicInfo.Inker: Carlos Ezquerra, Clint Langley, John Burns, Mark Sexton, Richard Elson, Carlos Ezquerra, Clint Langley, John Burns, Mark Sexton, Richard Elson
ComicInfo.Letterer: Annie Parkhouse, Ellie De Ville, Simon Bowland
ComicInfo.Characters: Daniel Calhoun, Gene the Hackman, Hammerstein, Intuitor Browne, Iztaccihuatl, Johnny Alpha, Judge Dredd, Mek-Quake, Middenface, Ro-Jaws, Sir Francis Bacon
ComicInfo.Teams: ABC Warriors, Judges of Mega-City One
